note: Employment is defined in line with the [13th ICLS](#dod:13-icls) and includes the production of goods for own use, such as subsistence farming.
title: Share of workers in informal employment: male vs. female
subtitle: Share of employed people working in jobs that lack basic social or legal protection and employment benefits. Does not include illegal and illicit activities. Figures refer to [national estimates](#dod:ilo-national-estimates) and may not be fully comparable across countries.

display.name: Share of male workers in informal employment
Share of female workers in informal employment
